text:
There is some suggestion that FUMHD may be a type of clonal T-cell disorder. Clonal means that all the T-cells were derived from the same cell. T cells are a type of white blood cell (lymphocytes). They make up part of the immune system. T cells help the body fight diseases or harmful substances.",GARD,Febrile Ulceronecrotic Mucha-Habermann disease
How to diagnose Febrile Ulceronecrotic Mucha-Habermann disease ?,"How is febrile ulceronecrotic Mucha-Habermann disease definitively diagnosed? FUMHD
